value.title: Enfield cancels its biggest event — the July 4th celebration due to coronavirus concerns
value.excerpt: ENFIELD — Growing concerns over the spread of the deadly novel coronavirus have prompted officials to cancel the town’s biggest event of the year — the annual Fourth of July Town Celebration that typically attracted about 50,000 people over three days of festivities. This year’s event was scheduled to run July 10-12 on the town green.

value.title: FIBA Europe cancel events due to COVID-19 pandemic
value.excerpt: The International Basketball Federation (FIBA) Europe have cancelled all of their 16 FIBA European Championships, as well as the Women's Summit in Postojna in Slovenia, due to the COVID-19 crisis. They have also suspended three FIBA Europe club competitions for the 2019-2020 season, the EuroLeague Women, EuroCup Women and the FIBA Europe Cup.

value.title: Wisconsin class action suit says StubHub reneged on guaranteed refunds for events now canceled because of coronavirus
value.excerpt: A Wisconsin man has sued the giant online ticket reseller StubHub for reneging on its money-back guarantee for events now canceled because of the coronavirus epidemic.
